com.hapi.sdk

Class Platform

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hapi.sdk.Platform
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AndroidPlatform

    public abstract class Platform
extends Object
    An abstraction of the most important platform differences between Android and Java. This is used so we have an option to also support Java client apps in the future.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Platform()

        public Platform()

    • Method Detail

      • httpExecutorService

        public abstract ExecutorService httpExecutorService()
        Returns:
        the executor which should be used to run http calls on. This can't be the main thread on Android.

      • callbackExecutor

        public abstract Executor callbackExecutor()
        Returns:
        the executor which should be used for callbacks. This must be the main thread on Android.

      • logger

        public abstract StormpathLogger logger()

      • preferenceStore

        public abstract PreferenceStore preferenceStore()

      • unknownErrorMessage
